product_name: Salomon Fast Wing Hoodie Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The lightweight Salomon Fast Wing Hoodie jacket features ClimaWIND(R) Pro fabric to block the wind and stay breathable during active sports. Plus, it packs small so you can stow it in your pack. Adjustable hood can be fine tuned for a perfect fit. Thumb loops keep sleeves in place. Adjustable cuffs feature elastic at wrists to keep wind out; elastic hem. The Salomon Fast Wing Hoodie jacket features reflective highlights on front and back to improve nighttime visibility. Closeout.
short_description: The lightweight Salomon Fast Wing Hoodie jacket features ClimaWIND(R) Pro fabric to block the wind and stay breathable during active sports. Plus, it packs small so you can stow it in your pack.
